title: Rain
description: Would you believe me?For fifteen year old , Tyler Grey, the line between myth and reality is quickly blurred , when he inadvertently becomes the host to an ancient power . A power that puts him on the radar of not only a deadly black ops organization but also very old and malevolent beings, that are eager to see both it and him destroyed .He has but two choices :“The story is filled with so much emotion, action and mystery! I loved it!!”-Avid YA Reviewer
author: Christopher L.P.
